review_data.title: Very yummy restaurant
review_data.content: Excellent Asian cuisine is offered at Thach, I have become a big fan over the past years. Pricing is extremely fair, the place is super cozy to hang out with friends, and the owners are always up for a chat. Very much recommended !

review_data.title: Great Lunch Buffet
review_data.content: I love Tach! They have a great variety at their lunch buffet and are reasonably priced for Zurich. Friendly staff and just plain tasty food. You don't leave hungry when you eat there ;)

review_data.title: Great food, decent prices
review_data.content: Great food, there are also vegetarian options. Portions are pretty big, prices are something that you expect in Zurich, but affordable.

review_data.title: Always satisfied

review_data.title: Excellent

review_data.title: My fave noodle soup in Zurich so far...
review_data.content: The vietnamese noodle soup was the tastiest non-pho soup I have tried so far in Zurich. We also had the most helpful and very friendly service. This place is a must-try!!!
